pr_title: Log collection api for datahub and datalake

CB-8045. Resolve references in VM log path fields

timeline.bodyText: what happens if you use this on distrox api? i think it will fail because it check for datalake
timeline.author: horadla23

replies.bodyText: Yea I think it would fail. I don't think it's a good idea to check datahub operations with datalake resource type

replies.bodyText: ohh sry its an old comment, not relevant, browser kept it

timeline.bodyText: as discussed, pls authorize this as it is done in related controller of datalake service
timeline.author: horadla23

timeline.message: CB-7979 - created diagnostics api for datalake
CB-7979 - created diagnostics api for datalake

CB-7978 - Added diagnostics collection flow for CM in cloudbreak. Some code that is shared with FreeIpa is extracted to common modules. Added diagnostics collection endpoints to both Cloudbreak and DistroX APIs. The endpoint in Cloudbreak will be used by Datalake.
CB-8032 - added UI notifications to cloudbreak's diagnostics flow steps

CB-8045 - Resolve references in VM log path fields. For freeipa static log paths were used, but for CM, references have to resolved from the vm-logs.json.

Signed-off-by: attilapalfi92 <apalfi@cloudera.com>
